bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPOUND REDEMPTION PROCESSOR FOR A SINGLE ISSUER

abstract.p: The present invention provides methods and apparatus for one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments for a Single Issuer. Apparatus can include a computerized system with executable software that is executable upon demand to process Redemption Instances, as well as, create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments for a Single Issuer.

The present invention provides methods and apparatus one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments. Apparatus can include a computerized system with executable software that is executable upon demand to process Redemption Instances as well as create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments.

The present invention provides methods and apparatus one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments. Apparatus can include a computerized system with executable software that is executable upon demand to process Redemption Instances as well as create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments.

The present invention provides methods and apparatus one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments. Apparatus can include a computerized system with executable software that is executable upon demand to process Redemption Instances as well as create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments.

The present invention provides methods and apparatus one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments. Apparatus can include a computerized system with executable software that is executable upon demand to process Redemption Instances as well as create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: APPARATUS FOR PROCESSING COMPOUND REDEMPTION OF A SINGLE ISSUER

abstract.p: The present invention provides methods and apparatus for a user to participate in one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments for a Single Issuer. Apparatus can include a network access device with executable software that is executable upon demand to transmit instructions to process Redemption Instances, as well as, create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments for a Single Issuer.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPOUND REDEMPTION APPARATUS AND METHOD OF USE

abstract.p: The present invention provides methods and apparatus relating to the creation and redemption of Compound Redeemable Instruments. Apparatus may a serve executing executable software to transmit information relating to Compound Redeemable Instruments and receive instructions to trade or redeem Compound Redeemable Instruments.

The present invention provides methods and apparatus one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments. Apparatus can include a computerized system with executable software that is executable upon demand to process Redemption Instances as well as create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments.

La présente invention porte sur des procédés et un appareil servant à réaliser une ou plusieurs opérations parmi : la création, l'émission et le rachat d'instruments rachetables composés. L'appareil peut comprendre un système informatisé comprenant un logiciel exécutable qui est exécutable à la demande pour traiter des instances de rachat ainsi que pour créer et émettre des instruments rachetables composés.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: APPARATUS FOR PROCESING COMPOUND REDEMPTION OF A SINGLE ISSUER
APPAREIL POUR LE TRAITEMENT DE RACHATS COMPOSÉS D'UN ÉMETTEUR UNIQUE

abstract.p: The present invention provides methods and apparatus for a user to participate in one or more of: creating, issuing and redeeming Compound Redeemable Instruments for a Single Issuer. Apparatus can include a network access device with executable software that is executable upon demand to transmit instructions to process Redemption Instances, as well as, create and issue Compound Redeemable Instruments for a Single Issuer.

La présente invention concerne des procédés et un appareil permettant à un utilisateur de participer à une ou plusieurs des opérations suivantes : la création, l'émission et le rachat de Titres Rachetables Composés pour un Emetteur Unique. L'appareil peut comprendre un dispositif d'accès au réseau utilisant un logiciel exécutable pouvant être exécuté sur demande pour transmettre des instructions destinées à traiter des Instances de Rachat, et créer et émettre des Titres Rachetables Composés pour un Emetteur Unique.
